sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"移居，迁移"之意。
means: emigrate ： 指自本国移出，长期定居在外。
immigrate ： 指自他国移入，长期定居。
migrate ： 通常指大批人短期或定期的移居。指动物时，则指定期迁徙、回游。

sentence.Network_en: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人们移居国外当海员。

sentence.Network_en: Economists warn that enormous pressures could build up, forcing people to emigrate westwards.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济学家警告，迫使人们向西部迁移的压力可能会增至很大的程度。

sentence.Network_en: Everybody was flabbergasted when I announced I was going to emigrate to Australia.
sentence.Network_cn: 我宣布要移民去澳大利亚时，所有人都惊呆了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... eject 投出，掷出 emigrate 移居国外 elect 选出.
纸条 emigrate 自本国移居他国 ideal 理想的,完美的 scandal 丑闻,恶意诽谤,流言蜚语, succession 连续,系列,继任,继承 radiate 放射,辐射,散步,传播 influential.
migrant 迁徙者，候鸟emigrate 移出，永久移居国外immigrate 移居入境，由国外移进

list.abs: 航海及海运专业英语词汇(E3) - 商务英语词汇 ... emery 金刚砂 emigration officer 移民局官员 emission cell 发射电池.

American Emgration ... American Immigration 移民到美国的人 emigration policy 移民政策.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin emigrat- 'emigrated', from the verb emigrare, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out of' + migrare 'migrate'

entry.def: If you emigrate, you leave your own country to live in another country.

means.word_mean: 1. leave one's country of residence for a new one;

sentences.sentence: "Many people had to emigrate during the Nazi period"

auth_sentence.content: Hundreds of thousands of Surinamese emigrate to the Netherlands.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hundreds of thousands of Surinamese emigrate to the Netherlands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hundreds of thousands of Surinamese emigrate to the Netherlands.

auth_sentence.content: I need to emigrate to France or somewhere!
auth_sentence.res_content: I need to emigrate to France or somewhere!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I need to emigrate to France or somewhere!

auth_sentence.content: The emigrate to another planet group also has it wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: The emigrate to another planet group also has it wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The emigrate to another planet group also has it wrong.

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出,出来+labor劳动+ate做→劳动出来→精做的
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+ject掷→掷出
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+merge=merg沉没,淹没→淹没的东西出现→浮现
e出,出来+migr移+ate表动词→移出
e出,出来+radic根+ate做→把根挖出→根除
e出,出来+vade走→走出去→逃避
e出,出来+valuate对……评价→出价值→评价
im进入+migr迁移+ant……的→adj.移来的,移民的
migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]+ory……的→adj.迁移的,流浪的
e出+migr迁移+ant人→n.移居外国者, 移民

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民出境, 侨居, [总称]移民
stems_affixes.word_buile: emigrate自本国移居他乡+ion动作或状态→emigration移民出境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+migr移+e→n.移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外来的移民, 移居入境
stems_affixes.word_buile: immigrate移居入境+ion动作或状态→immigration移居入境
migr迁移+ant人或物→迁移的鸟→候鸟

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民, 移植, 移往, 移动
stems_affixes.word_buile: migrate迁移,移居+ion动作或状态→migration移民;移往
e出+migr移+ate做→移出
im进入+migrate移居→入住
migr迁移+ate做→v.迁移,移居[国外]
trans变换+migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]→v.[宗]轮回, 移居

sentences.en: In the present difficult conditions, many people are emigrating from Britain.
sentences.cn: 在目前的困难时期, 很多人正离开英国, 移居国外。
